title: Folio 1C/D
publication_title: James Ensor: The Temptation of Saint Anthony
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">This folio also features fine, sweeping lines in the same blue chalk as in folio 1A/B; these too were formed by the textured pattern created by the mounting adhesive on the reverse. This phenomenon provides insight into the technical development of the overall composition, revealing that Ensor embellished and reworked the composition after he had joined individual sheets, and that he added pastel selectively in the top two rows and bottom right corner of the drawing once the whole work was mounted. SMC/KJN

</section><section id="figures">Folio 1C/D. Interactive image.

fig. 2 </section>
